choose.when: select cl.course_no, cl.users_no, cl.course_name, cl.course_difficulty, cl.course_length, cl.course_time, cl.course_hit, cl.course_region, cl.course_date, cl.course_open, cl.course_introduce, ul.users_nickname from course_list cl left join users_list ul on cl.users_no = ul.users_no left join course_point cp on cp.course_no = cl.course_no

select cl.course_no, ul.users_no, cl.course_name, cl.course_difficulty, cl.course_length, cl.course_time, cl.course_hit, cl.course_region, cl.course_date, cl.course_open, cl.course_introduce, ul.users_nickname from course_list cl left join users_list ul on cl.users_no = ul.users_no left join course_point cp on cp.course_no = cl.course_no where cl.users_no = #{users_no}

select cl.course_no, cl.users_no, cl.course_name, cl.course_difficulty, cl.course_length, cl.course_time, cl.course_hit, cl.course_region, cl.course_date, cl.course_open, cl.course_introduce, ul.users_nickname from course_favorites cf left join course_list cl on cf.course_no = cl.course_no left join users_list ul on cf.users_no = ul.users_no where cf.users_no = #{users_no}

mapper.select: select crl.review_no, crl.course_no, crl.users_no, crl.review_content, crl.review_date, ul.users_name, ul.users_nickname from course_review_list crl left join course_list cl on crl.course_no = cl.course_no left join users_list ul on ul.users_no = crl.users_no where crl.course_no = #{course_no}
mapper.insert: insert into course_review_list values ( null, #{course_no}, #{users_no}, #{review_content}, now() )
